title: Differences between Haitian and French Revolutions

content.question: In what way did the Haitian Revolution differ from the French Revolution?

choices.label: The French Revolution was inspired by Enlightenment ideas while the Haitian Revolution was not.
The Haitian Revolution began because of unfair taxation by the French king.
The leaders of the Haitian Revolution came from a different social class than did the leaders of the French Revolution.
The leaders of the French Revolution wanted religious freedom while the leaders of the Haitian Revolution wanted equal representation.

content.answer: The leaders of the Haitian Revolution came from a different social class than did the leaders of the French Revolution.

topic.text: 5.2: Nationalism and Revolutions in the Period from 1750 to 1900

skill.text: Skill 5.A: Identify patterns among or connections between historical developments and processes.
